features: Proven in a Clinical Trial: NovaFerrum has been clinically proven to be Safe, Well Tolerated, and Effective at raising iron levels. (JAMA June 13, 2017 Volume 317, Number 22)
18mg of iron per tablet: Unlike some brands, just one easy-to-chew tablet contains 18 mg of iron.
No bad stuff: Our chewables are sugar-free, gluten-free, and Kosher.

body.description: YAY - Iron Chewable Tablets For Ages 4 and Older NovaFerrum Iron chewable tablets is naturally sweetened and have a great orange taste children grow to love. Our supplements are intended for the use in improving the nutritional status for the prevention and treatment of iron deficiency. Our product is free of sugar, alcohol, dye, and gluten. Unlike most liquid multivitamins with iron supplements that use iron salts, our patent-pending formula uses a Polysaccharide-Iron Complex. NovaFerrum has a “great tasting” raspberry-grape flavor and does not have the unpleasant metallic aftertaste you find in most other iron liquid multivitamin with iron supplements.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YAY - Iron Chewable Tablets For Ages 4 and Older NovaFerrum Iron chewable tablets is naturally sweetened and have a great orange taste children grow to love. Our supplements are intended for the use in improving the nutritional status for the prevention and treatment of iron deficiency. Our product is free of sugar, alcohol, dye, and gluten. Unlike most liquid multivitamins with iron supplements that use iron salts, our patent-pending formula uses a Polysaccharide-Iron Complex. NovaFerrum has a “great tasting” raspberry-grape flavor and does not have the unpleasant metallic aftertaste you find in most other iron liquid multivitamin with iron supplements. Supplement Details Orange Flavor 18 mg of Iron 90 Chewable Tablets

Clinically Proven Unlike most other supplements, NovaFerrum has been clinically proven to be safe, well-tolerated, and effective at raising iron levels. (JAMA, June 13, 2017, Volume 317, Number 22) ONLY GOOD STUFF NovaFerrum contains premium ingredients designed for optimum quality and effectiveness. We add natural fruit flavors and natural fruit sweeteners. We won’t settle, and we know you won’t either, which is why we constantly seek the best nutritional ingredients available. NONE OF THE BAD STUFF NovaFerrum does NOT contain gluten, sugar, alcohol, parabens, synthetic colors, or caffeine. We scrutinize and agonize over every ingredient. We even consult licensed medical professionals so that you can feel good about what you’re taking, even before you take it.

OUR STORY BEGINS WITH A YUCK NovaFerrum was born of necessity. One day, our founder was attempting to give an iron supplement to his baby daughter. The product smelled bad. And, based on her reaction, it tasted even worse. She refused to take it. Thus began the journey for an iron supplement that was not only gentle and effective but tasted exceptionally good. NovaFerrum is a labor of love created for a family member. Only now, you’re family. We focus on natural, quality ingredients that are well tolerated and do the job in a big way. We remain passionate about providing products that don’t contain anything unnecessary, that can help keep you healthier, and that stand apart from other supplements. Welcome to the family. And thanks for sharing our passion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter will take
reviews.reviewText: My very picky daughter will take these and says they do taste like orange crush with a metallic taste at the end, but taken with her gummy vitamins she has no problems with them. The Best ones out there and no stomach upset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kid willingly takes this. I have taken to gauge the flavor and it just tastes like orange. This supplement should be the standard iron treatment over those barf-flavored liquids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iron with a good flavor!
reviews.reviewText: Both of my young kids need to take iron supplements but most taste so terrible. Not these though! My 1 and 6 year old both love these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This iron is absolutely FANTASTIC! We have tried so many different irons that are both prescription and over the counter and this is by far the BEST! Many of the liquids caused reflux, constipation, or stomach upset. We were so concerned that we wouldn’t find one for our son that didn’t cause problems and then I stumbled upon this brand. We are so so thankful that our son can take this without all the side effects and it even tastes good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids don’t complain of the taste! Easy to chew. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Taste better than the drops
reviews.reviewText: My kids both have slighly low iron, so I searched and found these. They taste much better than the drops, but since then I discovered R e n z o s meltaways which are even better. We'll finish these since I have a couple bottles then switch to the other brand. These do have a slight aftertaste and with chewing them it sticks in your teeth and the taste lingers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids likes it!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter needs iron supplement and the drops made her throw up. This alternative works perfectly!
